$ARKK $roku $tdoc good morning Vietnam!
Actually, it looks bad across the board for all tech stocks, even $AAPL and $AMZN are looking rough.  

I Would like to remind my followers that it doesn’t matter if your stocks drop 20 or 90%, you have not lost a dime unless you sell in a panic.  What’s old is new and vice versa, so buy what you like and hold on to it. Arkk is not invested in Penny Stocks, these companies are leaders in their fields of innovation and most have market caps over $10 billion dollars so they are not going out of business, only down into deep value for additional reversal profit. 

My advice is to average in at these low levels and stay out of the Margin so you can hold on until all of your money is returned to you. Perhaps you may even make a buck or two if you are patience. 

What ever you do, take it easy and abide.

links.title: Possibility of huge changes to App Store as US antitrust bill proceeds to committee
links.description: A proposed new US antitrust law first proposed back in August of last year has progressed to committee stage - the next step toward becoming law. If it were passed, it would result in huge changes to the App Store.

body:
$AAPL 

The argument for market is drunk is true.

Why?

If you look at the past trend at the old higher yield rate, the market was fine at that time.

Now, it is not fine. Practically the market is absent minded about the past.

Once time goes on, the pain goes away and the market will rise ..

So AAPL will do fine no matter what.

Why?  Profit, dividends and buybacks. And use this kind as dipping mode.
